jokes.title: batman
jokes.body: My boss said "dress for the job you want, not for the job you have." So I went in as Batman.

jokes.title: aquarium
jokes.body: I went to the aquarium this weekend, but I didn't stay long. There's something fishy about that place.

jokes.title: sheep
jokes.body: What do you call a sheep who can sing and dance?

jokes.title: french man shoes
jokes.body: What do you call a French man wearing sandals?

jokes.title: dinosaur
jokes.body: Why can't dinosaurs clap their hands?

jokes.title: odd job man
jokes.body: I gave my handyman a to-do list, but he only did jobs 1, 3, and 5. Turns out he only does odd jobs.

jokes.title: wolf
jokes.body: What do you call a dog who meditates?

jokes.title: old lady
jokes.body: Today at the bank, an old lady asked me to check her balance... So I pushed her over.

jokes.title: darkside
jokes.body: How many storm troopers does it take to change a lightbulb?
jokes.answer: None, because they are all on the dark side.

jokes.title: cold house
jokes.body: If your house is cold, just stand in the corner. It's always 90 degrees there.

jokes.title: thesaurus
jokes.body: The other day I bought a thesaurus, but when I got home and opened it, all the pages were blank. I have no word to describe how angry I am.

jokes.title: broken drums
jokes.body: What is the best present? Broken drums! You can't beat them.

jokes.title: tortilla
jokes.body: I tried to make song about a tortilla once, but it was more like a wrap.

jokes.title: shorter
jokes.body: What word can you make shorter by adding two letters?

jokes.title: dawn
jokes.body: I stayed up all night wondering where the sun went, and then it dawned on me.

jokes.title: holy water
jokes.body: How do you make holy water?
jokes.answer: You boil the hell out of it.

jokes.title: elvis
jokes.body: What did Elvis say to his landscaper?

jokes.title: circus clowns
jokes.body: The other day I was attacked by a bunch of circus clowns in a parking lot. I won though, cause I went right for the juggler.

jokes.title: pterodactyl
jokes.body: Why can't you hear a pterodactyl go to the bathroom?

jokes.title: labrathor
jokes.body: What's a dog's favorite Marvel character?

jokes.title: chicken
jokes.body: What do you say when a chicken is looking at salad?

jokes.title: velcro
jokes.body: Velcro. What a rip-off.

jokes.title: crime in a lift
jokes.body: Crime in multi-storey car parks. That is wrong on so many levels.

jokes.title: exit signs
jokes.body: Exit signs. They're on the way out.

jokes.title: arrested
jokes.body: I was arrested for flying into a rage. The other passengers were terrified.

jokes.title: fencing
jokes.body: I've just been to the gym and there's a new machine there. I used it for an hour and felt sick. It's brilliant though. It does everything: Mars bars, KitKats, crisps...

jokes.title: gardening
jokes.body: I rang up my local swimming baths. I said, "Is that the local swimming baths?" They said, "It depends where you're calling from."

jokes.title: black horse
jokes.body: Black Beauty. Now there's a dark horse.

jokes.title: alphabet
jokes.body: The first rule of alphabet club is you don't talk about alphabet club. The second rule of alphabet club is you don't talk about alphabet club. The third rule...

jokes.title: ship
jokes.body: I saw this bloke chatting up a cheetah. I thought, he's trying to pull a fast one.

jokes.title: diving
jokes.body: I saw a documentary on how ships are kept together. Riveting.

jokes.title: calendar
jokes.body: I'm reading a book about anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down.

jokes.title: umbrella
jokes.body: I asked my girlfriend if she wanted to go to the gym. She said, "I'm not that fit." I said, "Just wear baggy clothes then."

jokes.title: spiders
jokes.body: Spiders are brilliant web designers.

jokes.title: kidnapping
jokes.body: So I rang up British Telecom. I said, "I want to report a nuisance caller." They said, "Not you again."

jokes.title: whiteboards
jokes.body: Whiteboards are remarkable.

jokes.title: scarecrow
jokes.body: Why did the scarecrow win an award?
jokes.answer: Because he was outstanding in his field.

jokes.title: broken pencil
jokes.body: I was going to tell you a joke about a broken pencil, but there's no point.

jokes.title: ceiling
jokes.body: The ceiling isn't the best thing in the world, but it's up there.

jokes.title: backwards
jokes.body: I used to hate facial hair, but then it grew on me.

jokes.title: calendar2
jokes.body: My calendar's days are numbered.

jokes.title: belt
jokes.body: I got a belt made of watches for my birthday. It was a waist of time.

jokes.title: ocean
jokes.body: Why don't scientists trust atoms?

jokes.title: invisible
jokes.body: I used to be invisible, but nobody noticed.

jokes.title: baker
jokes.body: A man walks into a library and asks for books about paranoia. The librarian whispers, "They're right behind you."

jokes.title: pirate
jokes.body: What's a pirate's favorite letter?
jokes.answer: You'd think it's R, but it's the C they love.

jokes.title: bicycle
jokes.body: I couldn't work out how to fasten my seatbelt. Then it clicked.

jokes.title: electrician
jokes.body: I'm friends with an electrician. He's a very current person.

jokes.title: batteries
jokes.body: I bought some batteries, but they weren't included.

jokes.title: restaurant
jokes.body: I went to a seafood disco last week. I pulled a mussel.

jokes.title: stairs
jokes.body: I don't trust stairs. They're always up to something.

jokes.title: grapes
jokes.body: I tried to catch fog yesterday. Mist.

jokes.title: camping
jokes.body: Why did the campfire break up with the tent?
jokes.answer: Because the tent was too intense.

jokes.title: tree
jokes.body: I'm thinking about removing my spine. I feel it's holding me back.

jokes.title: window
jokes.body: I had a job crushing cans. It was soda pressing.

jokes.title: magician
jokes.body: A magician was driving down the road. Then he turned into a driveway.

jokes.title: shovel
jokes.body: The shovel was a ground-breaking invention.

jokes.title: broom
jokes.body: I'm sweeping the nation. I'm a broom.

jokes.title: cheese
jokes.body: What do you call cheese that isn't yours?

jokes.title: hipster
jokes.body: I burned my Hawaiian pizza today. Should've put it on aloha temperature.

jokes.title: kidnap
jokes.body: Did you hear about the kidnapping at school? It's fine, he woke up.

jokes.title: skeleton
jokes.body: Why didn't the skeleton go to the party?
jokes.answer: He had no body to go with.

jokes.title: almond
jokes.body: I'm nuts about you. I'm an almond.

jokes.title: math
jokes.body: Parallel lines have so much in common. It's a shame they'll never meet.

jokes.title: elevator
jokes.body: My first job was working in an orange juice factory, but I got canned. Couldn't concentrate.

jokes.title: origami
jokes.body: I'm reading a horror story in Braille. Something bad is about to happen, I can feel it.

jokes.title: rope
jokes.body: What did the ocean say to the beach?

jokes.title: frog
jokes.body: What do you call a frog with no legs?

jokes.title: comedian
jokes.body: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.

jokes.title: paper
jokes.body: I'm afraid of speed bumps, but I'm slowly getting over it.

jokes.title: furniture
jokes.body: I used to work at a calendar factory but I got fired for taking a few days off.

jokes.title: crossword
jokes.body: I've got a phobia of over-engineered buildings. It's a complex complex complex.

jokes.title: hat
jokes.body: What do you call a fish without eyes?

jokes.title: tennis
jokes.body: Tennis players don't marry because love means nothing to them.

jokes.title: needle
jokes.body: I wondered why the frisbee was getting bigger. Then it hit me.

jokes.title: astronaut
jokes.body: How do you organize a space party?

jokes.title: clock
jokes.body: I asked the clock if it wanted some food. It went back four seconds.

jokes.title: towel
jokes.body: I threw a boomerang a few years ago. I now live in constant fear.

jokes.title: dictionary
jokes.body: Irony. The opposite of wrinkly.

jokes.title: butcher
jokes.body: A butcher backed into the meat grinder and got a little behind in his work.

jokes.title: doctor
jokes.body: What do you call a fake noodle?

jokes.title: snowman
jokes.body: What do you call a snowman with a six-pack?

jokes.title: music
jokes.body: I can't believe I got fired from the calendar factory. All I did was take a day off.

jokes.title: bee
jokes.body: What do you call a bee that can't make up its mind?

jokes.title: banana
jokes.body: Why did the banana go to the doctor?

jokes.title: shoe
jokes.body: What do you call shoes made of bananas? Slippers.

jokes.title: bread
jokes.body: A man walked into a bar with a piece of tarmac under his arm. He said, "A pint please, and one for the road."

jokes.title: claustrophobia
jokes.body: Claustrophobic people are more productive thinking outside the box.

jokes.title: nose
jokes.body: What did one eye say to the other?
jokes.answer: Between you and me, something smells.

jokes.title: photon
jokes.body: A photon checks into a hotel. The bellboy asks if he needs help with his luggage. The photon says, "No thanks, I'm traveling light."

jokes.title: coffee
jokes.body: How does Moses make his coffee?

jokes.title: wiper
jokes.body: I bought a dog from a blacksmith. As soon as I got him home, he made a bolt for the door.

jokes.title: eggs
jokes.body: I was going to tell a time-traveling joke, but you didn't like it.

jokes.title: zoo
jokes.body: I went to the zoo and saw a baguette in a cage. The zookeeper said it was bread in captivity.

jokes.title: computer
jokes.body: Why was the computer cold?

jokes.title: mirror
jokes.body: I broke my arm in two places. The doctor told me to stop going to those places.

jokes.title: lettuce
jokes.body: Lettuce romaine calm. We'll get through this.

jokes.title: penguin
jokes.body: What do you call a penguin in the desert?

jokes.title: vampire
jokes.body: Why don't vampires attack Taylor Swift?

jokes.title: piano
jokes.body: I used to play piano by ear. Now I use my hands.

jokes.title: gym2
jokes.body: I told my gym instructor I wanted to do splits. He said, "How flexible are you?" I said, "I can't do Tuesdays."

jokes.title: pasttime
jokes.body: Nostalgia isn't what it used to be.

jokes.title: buffet
jokes.body: I went to a buffet with my laptop. I was hoping for the Wi-Fi to be free too.

jokes.title: gardener
jokes.body: Why do gardeners make good detectives?

jokes.title: reverse
jokes.body: I used to be addicted to the hokey cokey. But I turned myself around.

jokes.title: leftovers
jokes.body: My wife told me to stop acting like a flamingo. I had to put my foot down.

jokes.title: sausage
jokes.body: I'm in a band called Missing Cat. You've probably seen our posters.

jokes.title: sheep2
jokes.body: What do you call a sheep with no legs?

jokes.title: doors
jokes.body: I've decided to sell my vacuum cleaner. It was just gathering dust.

jokes.title: hospital
jokes.body: I have a fear of elevators, so I'm taking steps to avoid them.

jokes.title: windmill
jokes.body: What do you call a wind turbine that doesn't work?

jokes.title: mountain
jokes.body: I'm addicted to brake fluid. But I can stop whenever I want.
